## The project

The **xPack {{appName}}** project is part of the
[xPack Reproducible Build Framework](https://xpack.github.io)
and is hosted on GitHub as
[`xpack-dev-tools/{{appLcName}}-xpack`](https://github.com/xpack-dev-tools/{{appLcName}}-xpack),
part of the [xPack 3rd Party Development Tools](https://github.com/xpack-dev-tools/).

## The author

This project is currently maintained by **Liviu Ionescu**, a senior computer
engineer, with expertise in operating systems, compilers, embedded
systems, RTOSes, build tools and Internet technologies.

He can be reached at [`<ilg@livius.net>`](mailto:ilg@livius.net) (this email
address is given for courtesy, for all correspondence related to this
project please use the project [support](/docs/support/) page).
